bioAsHtml: I am a backend engineer, creator of a scala GraphQL implementation Sangria, scala dependency injection library Scaldi and author several blogs (http://hacking-scala.org, https://medium.com/@oleg.ilyenko). I'm passionate about scala, functional and functional-reactive programming, continuous delivery, API design and agile management.

acceptedTalks.title: GraphQL - a type system for your API

bio: I am a backend engineer, creator of a scala GraphQL implementation [Sangria](http://sangria-graphql.org), scala dependency injection library [Scaldi](http://scaldi.org) and author several blogs ([http://hacking-scala.org](http://hacking-scala.org), [https://medium.com/@oleg.ilyenko](https://medium.com/@oleg.ilyenko)). I'm passionate about scala, functional and functional-reactive programming, continuous delivery, API design and agile management.
